mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", b.name AS "province.name", a.province_id AS "provinceId", c.name AS "city.name", a.city_id AS "cityId", d.name AS "area.name", a.district_id AS "districtId", e.name AS "street.name", a.street_id AS "streetId", f.name AS "goodsName", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.amount AS "amount", a.sales_volume AS "salesVolume", a.is_market AS "isMarket", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.account_id AS "accountId"

LEFT JOIN system_province b ON a.province_id = b.id LEFT JOIN system_city c ON a.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system_area d ON a.district_id = d.id LEFT JOIN system_street e ON a.street_id = e.id LEFT JOIN mb_goods f ON a.goods_id = f.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_region_goods( province_id, city_id, district_id, street_id, goods_id, amount, sales_volume, is_market, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, account_id )VALUES ( #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{streetId}, #{goodsId}, #{amount}, #{salesVolume}, #{isMarket}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{accountId} )

UPDATE md_region_goods SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE id=#{id}
